wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Cecil Graham Joy (30 July 1898 – 12 December 1974) was an English cricketer. A right-handed batsman and right-arm fast-medium bowler, he played for Essex between 1922 and 1928. His father-in-law Frank Penn played Test cricket for England in 1880.

response: *Ronald Joy – played for Essex between 1922 and 1928.Ronald Joy at CricketArchive
